descript.value: SQL text для запросов к БД чеков Кристалл

sqlgetsum.value: SELECT abs(round(sum(h.Summa), 2)) as summa FROM [ChequeHead] h WITH (NOLOCK) where h.Cash_Code <> '' and convert(date, h.DateOperation) = ? and h.StatusFiscal <> 0 and h.Status <> 0 and h.Operation = ? and h.shopindex = ?

sqlheadcheck.value: SET DATEFORMAT dmy; SELECT h.ID AS _DOCIDCASH, convert(datetime, h.DateOperation) AS _DOCDATE, CAST(CASE WHEN h.Operation= 'P' THEN 'SALE' ELSE 'RET' END AS varchar) AS _DOCTYPE, h.ShopIndex AS _EXTERNALOBJCHECKID, h.Ck_Number AS _NUMBER, abs(h.Summa) AS _DOCSUMM FROM ChequeHead AS h WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE h.Cash_Code <> '' and convert(date, h.DateOperation) = ? and h.shopindex = ? and h.Operation = ? and h.StatusFiscal <> 0 and h.Status <> 0 order by _DOCIDCASH

sqldetailcheck.value: SELECT P.ChequeId AS _DOCIDCASH, cast(CAST(CASE WHEN LEFT(P.Code, 1)= '_' THEN REPLACE(P.code, '_', '') ELSE P.code END AS int) AS Varchar) AS _WARESCODE, abs(P.Quant) AS _AMOUNT, P.Price AS _PRICE, abs(P.Summa) AS _SUMMA FROM ChequePos AS P WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE P.ChequeId = ?
